oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paterson, J.T., engraver
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Map of Northern Georgia and Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: J. T. Paterson & Co., Augusta, Georgia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color topographic map showing lower central portion of East Tennessee and upper portion of Northwest Georgia with inset showing Chattanooga and vicinity. Has ornamental border with stylized floral design.

This map shows the topography of the Tennessee River valley at Chattanooga's Moccasin Bend. The battles of Chickamauga and Lookout Mountain in 1863 were fought on this rugged terrain which was the gateway for Union occupation of the Atlantic South.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War
Visualizing the War; The Persistence of Memory
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: United States -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga; United States -- Georgia
